Article.Title: Shiny Krabby and New Encounters for October

Text.p: Shiny Krabby has appeared and I have updated the appropriate charts.
And, for the month of October, there have been changes to the Research Tasks. I have updated the Encounters Chart.

The new GAME_MASTER with Deoxys stats was released on Wednesday.
However, the stats are a lot lower than I expected. Take a look at the possibilites on the Raid Bosses charts.

MewTwo is now available as a plain Tier 5 Raid Boss -And- it has been announced that the new EX Raid Boss will be Deoxys!
As such, I have updated the Raid Boss charts.
However, the current GAME_MASTER file doesn't have the base stats for Deoxys, so I have no no way to create an accurate chart. As such, I have put Deoxyx as a placeholder in the Raid Boss Charts, but have left them disabled.
(I'll keep an eye out for a new GAME_MASTER and will update as soon as the Deoxys stats are there.)

Oh yeah, for the Community Event yesterday, Chikorita (and its evolutions) can now be shiny.
And, if you evolved a Meganium during the event, it learned the Charged Move Frenzy Plant, which would now be considered a Legacy move. The appropriate charts have been updated.
